GSD.description:
nfc: nfcmrvl: Fix memory leak in nfcmrvl_play_deferred

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.200 by commit 6b4d8b44e7163a77fe942f5b80e1651c1b78c537. For more details please see the references link.
